document.full_text: the port authority of new york and new jersey gave the all clear after they sent a bomb squad on friday to investigate suspicious cargo at newark liberty international airport, a port authority spokesman said on friday.
document.title: "suspicious situation" at newark airport is cleared
lines_and_colors: the port authority of new york and new jersey gave the all clear after they sent a bomb squad on friday to investigate suspicious cargo at newark liberty international airport, a port authority spokesman said on friday.
